messages.content: On cloverfield movie poster with two broken statue of liberty, Is there cloverfield monster outline shown ?

I'm sorry, but I'm not sure what you're referring to. The Cloverfield movie poster features a distorted image of the Statue of Liberty, with one of the torch arms broken off. However, there is no monster outline visible on the poster. If you could provide me with a clearer image or description of the poster, I'd be happy to help you out!
I mean version of poster with two statues of liberty with city in background with clouds looking like outline of monster.

Ah, I see. It sounds like you're referring to a promotional poster for the Cloverfield movie, which features a close-up shot of two broken Statue of Liberty replicas in a city street, with clouds in the background that resemble the outline of a monster. The poster doesn't actually show a monster outline, but instead creates an illusion of one with the clouds. I hope that helps!
Can you describe me Cloverfield Clouds poster ?

Sure! The Cloverfield Clouds poster features an image of the Statue of Liberty in the background, with clouds in the sky that resemble the outline of a monster. The poster doesn't actually show a monster outline, but instead creates an illusion of one with the clouds. It's a very striking and dramatic poster, and is one of the most memorable images from the film.
